description.p: Compute the maximum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.
Returns the maximum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

discussion.p: The Max function computes the maximum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

example.caption: Max() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT Max(Order_Details.Quantity) AS MaxQuantity FROM [Order Details] Order_Details =130
